slide1.title: Welcome to ByByte.DIY
slide1.subtitle: STEM Robotics Platform
slide1.description: Learn robotics, programming, and engineering through hands-on projects with our innovative educational platform.

feature1.title: Easy to Assemble
feature1.description: All components are modular and simple to connect, so even beginners can build the robot with ease.

feature2.title: Affordable & Open
feature2.description: The project is open-source and based on widely available parts, making it accessible to everyone.

feature3.title: Learn by Doing
feature3.description: Students gain practical skills in electronics, programming, and robotics through real experiments.

feature4.title: Expandable Platform
feature4.description: Start with the basics and gradually add sensors and modules to explore advanced robotics.

about.title: What is ByByte?
about.description: ByByte is an open educational robotics platform designed for children and students aged 7 to 16. We have developed two levels of robots:

mega.title: ByByteMega
mega.subtitle: Maximum platform with all possible sensors

nano.title: ByByteNano
nano.subtitle: Lightweight version with minimal components for quick and easy assembly

about.compatibility: Both options are fully compatible with Arduino IDE, have open schematics, code and documentation.

points.title: Practical knowledge
points.description: Children learn not only theory, but also real skills.

points.title: Accessibility
points.description: Simple modules, easy assembly, minimal tools required.

points.title: Openness
points.description: Anyone can download schematics and lessons.

points.title: Interest development
points.description: From basic experiments to robot competitions.

steps.title: Download schematics and instructions from GitHub

hero.title: ByByte community
hero.description: We share knowledge, solve problems, give support to overcome obstacles, you can meet like minded people but at the same time we are the most diverse DIY robot community in the world!
hero.tagline: A free network of robot builders, beginners, makers, parents and educators.

build.title: Robot Assembly
build.description: Here we will add steps, guides and resources for assembling the robot.

hero.title: Build your first robot with ByByte
hero.subtitle: Simple assembly from ready-made modules. All you need is some time, a soldering iron and curiosity.

home.title: ByByte.DIY - STEM Robotics Platform
home.description: Learn robotics, programming, and engineering through hands-on projects with our innovative educational platform. Build robots with Arduino, ESP32, and Raspberry Pi.
home.keywords: robotics, programming, Arduino, ESP32, Raspberry Pi, STEM education, DIY robots, electronics, engineering

structuredData.name: ByByte.DIY
structuredData.description: STEM Robotics Platform for learning robotics, programming, and engineering

build.title: Build Your Robot - ByByte.DIY
build.description: Step-by-step guide to building your first robot with ByByte. Simple assembly from ready-made modules. All you need is time, a soldering iron, and curiosity.
build.keywords: robot assembly, DIY robot, Arduino robot, electronics assembly, robotics tutorial, STEM project

community.title: ByByte Community - Join Robot Builders
community.description: Join our diverse DIY robot community. Share knowledge, solve problems, get support, and meet like-minded people in the world's most diverse robot building community.
community.keywords: robot community, DIY community, robotics forum, maker community, STEM community, robot builders

products.title: ByByte Products - Educational Robotics Kits
products.description: Discover ByByteMega and ByByteNano educational robotics kits. Open-source, modular, and designed for students aged 7-16. Learn robotics through hands-on projects.
products.keywords: educational robotics, robot kits, STEM kits, Arduino kits, educational technology, learning robots

docs.title: ByByte Documentation - Assembly Guides & Tutorials
docs.description: Complete documentation for ByByte robotics platform. Assembly guides, programming tutorials, and educational resources for teachers and students.
docs.keywords: robotics documentation, assembly guides, programming tutorials, educational resources, STEM documentation

blog.title: ByByte Blog - Robotics Tutorials & Tips
blog.description: Stay updated with the latest robotics tutorials, tips, and projects from our community. Learn from experienced makers and share your own creations.
blog.keywords: robotics blog, DIY tutorials, maker tips, robotics projects, STEM blog, educational content

learn.title: Learn Robotics - ByByte Educational Platform
learn.description: Master robotics and programming with ByByte's comprehensive learning platform. Interactive lessons, hands-on projects, and step-by-step tutorials for all skill levels.
learn.keywords: learn robotics, programming education, STEM learning, robotics courses, educational platform, hands-on learning
